snippet: Allianz has taken a $30 million (17.88 million pounds) hit, or about 9 percent of the insured market loss, on the Malaysia Airlines plane that disappeared in March, the German insurer said on Wednesday....

headline.print_headline: Allianz Taking $30 Million Hit on Malaysia Airlines Plane Loss-CFO
headline.main: Allianz Taking $30 Million Hit on Malaysia Airlines Plane Loss-CFO

lead_paragraph: Allianz has taken a $30 million (17.88 million pounds) hit, or about 9 percent of the insured market loss, on the Malaysia Airlines plane that disappeared in March, the German insurer said on Wednesday.
